text: Campomanesia lundiana, also known as the Rio de Janeiro myrtle, was a species of plant in the family Myrtaceae. Before modern extinction, the plant was endemic to Rio de Janeiro state, within the Atlantic Forest ecoregion in southeastern Brazil. ==References== lundiana Category:Extinct plants Category:Endemic flora of Brazil Category:Flora of Rio de Janeiro (state) Category:Flora of Atlantic Forest (biome) Category:Extinct biota of South America Category:Plant extinctions since 1500 Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Campomanesia lundiana
